description:
There are double copies for limits middleware. In 'nova.api.openstack.compute.limits' and  'nova.api.openstack.compute.plugins.v3.limits'

For v2 and v3, but there isn't any different between them, and they will run different instance of limit middleware. So we can share same code for them.
title: The code of limits middleware between v2 and v3 api

comments.content: There is double copy for limits middleware. For v2 and v3, but there isn't different between v2 and v3. So we can remove one of it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xuhj

comments.content:
After discussion, we prefer to remove ratelimit from v3 api

The discussion at here http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2013-November/020291.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xuhj
